biotools.summary:
Detecting distant-homology protein structures by aligning deep neural-network based contact maps.

fold recorgnition by eigen-decomposition of contact map.

CEthreader (Contact Eigenvector-based threader) is a new threading algorithm that combines contact-map with profile-based alignments for protein fold recognition.

bioschemas.name: CEthreader
